en: Instancing fading sprites that match the player's animation can create powerful effects.
Using radial accellation on a particle system can be used for charging effects to build up anticipation.
Creating complex effects is easy using multiple particle systems, timed with an animation player.
Simulate a fireball that emits 2D light with multiple particle systems. Click and hold the left mouse button to charge a firebolt with your staff.
Using a viewport and a directional blur post processing effect, we can create a high quality motion blur effect on the background.
